label: Time-Reversibility & Symplectic Integrity
mathematical_goal: Prove that geometric residues are path-independent (no hysteresis) due to symplectic structure preservation
theoretical_significance: The symplectic structure ω of phase space is preserved under Hamiltonian evolution. This ensures that the 125 geometric residues are path-independent: the value of any physical observable does not depend on the computational or historical path taken to calculate it. This 'hysteresis seal' guarantees that the theory is time-reversible at the fundamental level, and that residue calculations are reproducible regardless of the order of operations.
